mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, user_login_id as loginId, user_password as password, user_name as name, user_email as email, user_salt as salt, user_nickname as nickname, user_mismatch_cnt as mismatchCnt, user_is_auth as isAuth, user_auth_key as authKey, user_is_lock as isLock, user_lock_key as lockKey FROM USER WHERE user_email = #{email}
